int coffee shop day

sarah walks in

SARAH
wheres john

barista shrugs

    BARISTA
i dont know

sarah sits down.pulls out phone

text from john:"be there soon"

JOHN enters

john: sorry im late
sarah:its ok

they talk quietly

FADE TO

parking lot

john-I didnt mean it
    sarah
        (sad)
    i know

beat

sarah:well figure it out

they leave

fade out
